question: Match the gynoecium-related terms with their correct NCERT-based descriptions:
answer: Monocarpellary–Single pistil, Syncarpous–Fused pistils, Apocarpous–Free pistils, Ovary–Basal bulged part of pistil, Ovules–Arise from placenta

question: Match each ovule-related term with its correct NCERT-defined description:
column_II: Mass of cells with reserve food
matches: Nucellus–Mass of cells with reserve food
answer: Funicle–Stalk attaching ovule to placenta, Hilum–Junction between ovule and funicle, Micropyle–Small opening in integuments, Chalaza–Basal part of ovule, Nucellus–Mass of cells with reserve food
